programme.title: Women's 15km Individual - Biathlon | Olympic Winter Games Beijing 2022
programme.desc: This event took place on 07/02/2022 at the Zhangjiakou Biathlon Ctr. Denise Herrmann (GER) claimed Gold while Anais Chevalier-Bouchet (FRA) claimed the Silver and Marte Olsbu Roeiseland (NOR) completed the podium.

programme.title: Women's 500 m & Men's 1000 m Finals - Short Track Speed Skating | Olympic Winter Games Beijing 2022
programme.desc: This event took place on 07/02/2022 at the Capital Indoor Stadium. At the Women´s 500m Arianna Fontana (ITA) won Gold and retained the Olympic title, with a time of 42.488. Suzanne Schulting (NED) won Silver, while the Bronze went to Kim Boutin (CAN). At the Men´s 1000m Ziwei Ren (CHN) was the Olympic champion with a time of 1:26, while Wenlong Li (CHN) won Silver with 1:29 and Shaoang Liu (HUN) took the Bronze

programme.title: A Great Start to the Season | On Edge
programme.desc:
It’s the teams’ first chance of the season to try their brand-new ice dancing programs in competition and in front of a live audience. Olivia and Adrian have a decisive performance for their Olympic qualification. Gabriella and Guillaume compete for the first time in 20 months. Madison and Evan get to see how the crowd react to try their new program. Lilah and Lewis are in for a great start.
Filmed in the last six months leading up to Beijing 2022, On Edge is the Olympic Channel’s first weekly figure skating reality docuseries featuring athletes Madison Chock and Evan Bates (USA), Gabriella Papadakis and Guillaume Cizeron (FRA), Madison Hubbell and Zach Donohue (USA), Olivia Smart and Adrian Diaz (ESP), Laurence Fournier-Beaudry and Nikolaj Sorensen (CAN), Lilah Fear and Lewis Gibson (GBR), and coaches Marie-France Dubreuil and Patrice Lauzon, Romain Haguenauer and three time Olympic Gold medallist Scott Moir.

programme.title: From Helsinki to Vegas | On Edge
programme.desc:
Back from Finland, the teams are prepping for the beginning of the ice dancing Grand Prix season. Four of the teams compete in Skate America 2021 in Vegas, where Madi and Zach defend their title, and Madi and Evan try to go for the win. Lilah and Guillaume talk about the homophobic remarks that came out of Finland.
Filmed in the last six months leading up to Beijing 2022, On Edge is the Olympic Channel’s first weekly figure skating reality docuseries featuring athletes Madison Chock and Evan Bates (USA), Gabriella Papadakis and Guillaume Cizeron (FRA), Madison Hubbell and Zach Donohue (USA), Olivia Smart and Adrian Diaz (ESP), Laurence Fournier-Beaudry and Nikolaj Sorensen (CAN), Lilah Fear and Lewis Gibson (GBR), and coaches Marie-France Dubreuil and Patrice Lauzon, Romain Haguenauer and three time Olympic Gold medallist Scott Moir.

programme.title: Men's 15km & 15km Skiathlon - Cross-Country Skiing | Olympic Winter Games Beijing 2022
programme.desc: This event took place on 06/02/2022 at the Zhangjiakou Crs-Ctry Ctr, Alexander Bolshunov (ROC) claimed Gold, Denis Spitsov (ROC) Silver and Iivo Niskanen (FIN) completed the podium.

programme.title: USA v CAN | Men's Ice Hockey Semifinals | Sochi 2014 Replays
programme.desc: In a highly anticipated North American showdown, Canada edged out Team USA 1-0 in a defensive battle. Jamie Benn’s second-period tip-in was the difference-maker, while Carey Price delivered a clutch shutout against an American offense featuring Patrick Kane and Phil Kessel. The disciplined defensive effort sent Canada to the gold medal game.

programme.title: SWE v CAN | Men's Ice Hockey Gold Match and Ceremony | Sochi 2014 Replays
programme.desc: Canada defended their Olympic title with a dominant 3-0 victory over Sweden. Jonathan Toews, Sidney Crosby, and Chris Kunitz each scored, while Carey Price recorded a flawless shutout. With airtight defense and elite NHL talent, Canada secured back-to-back Olympic gold medals, cementing their status as the world’s best.

programme.title: Mixed Doubles Bronze Medal Match SWE vs GBR - Curling | Olympic Winter Games Beijing 2022
programme.desc: This event took place on 08/02/2022 at the Nat. Aquatics Ctr - Sheet B. Oskar Eriksson and Almida de Val (SWE) won the match and took home Bronze while Jennifer Dodds and Bruce Mouat (GBR) ended up in the 4th place.

programme.title: Mixed Doubles Gold Medal Match ITA vs NOR - Curling | Olympic Winter Games Beijing 2022
programme.desc: This event took place on 08/02/2022 at the Nat. Aquatics Ctr - Sheet B. Final Score: ITA 8:5 NOR. Italy won the final and took home Gold, Norway Silver and Sweden completed the podium.
